questions.question: Do you think of the universe as a computer or maybe an information processing system?
Do we have a lot of hope in being able to summarize much of our world?
I mean, you just have a little bit of air pollution and these trees die and we can adapt, right?
Is it also general intelligence that we have to distinguish or is only super human intelligence, general artificial intelligence?
So just to draw a line between prediction and planning, what do you mean by prediction in this way?
Another way to ask it, what are the parameters of AIXE that can be controlled?
You can calculate, you know, human life says 30 or 100 years doesn't matter, right?
This kind of word, curiosity, creativity, is that kind of the reward function being of getting new information?
But what do you see as the steps that are necessary to take to start to try to build something?
Does it need to be a day in the past or can it be a day in the future?
